title: Loki
synopsis: Loki is our red Alaskan Klee Kai. His bread is rare in the UK with only a few breeders here and long waiting lists for dogs if you pass the entrance exam! Owners often resort to importing their dogs.

It is a relatively new north american breed. They have the looks, energy and temperament of their larger cousins the Alaskan Husky. They were bread to be spitz size dogs, and he is now fully grown at 16
For more information about the breed, please visit the Alaskan Klee Kai Association of America website where you can also read about how it all started.
